text: Atahpara yadi jana yaya ye, ubhaya osi kona gonahe jarita rayeche, tabe yadera birud'dhe gonaha hayechila, tadera madhya theke mrtu byaktira nikatatama duâ€™byakti tadera sthalabhisikta habe. Atahpara allahara name kasama khabe ye, abasya'i amadera saksya tadera saksyara ca'ite adhika satya ebam amara sima atikrama karini. Ematabasthaya amara abasya'i atyacari haba.
